channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Credit where credit’s due: Inside Experian’s AI framework that’s changing financial access
item.description: Experian's enterprise AI framework offers valuable lessons for businesses seeking to scale beyond proof of concept.

item.title: Serve Robotics CEO Ali Kashani on the future of last-mile logistics
item.description: Serve Robotics CEO and co-founder Ali Kashani discusses the growth of the sidewalk robotics business and the road ahead. The post Serve Robotics CEO A...

item.title: Kollmorgen releases SFD-M high-resolution encoder with multi-turn absolute feedback
item.description: Designed to work with AKD and AKD2G drives, the SFD-M absolute multi-turn encoder can be integrated into Kollmorgen-housed servo motors. The post Koll...

item.title: Researchers warn of ‘catastrophic overtraining’ in LLMs
item.description: The researchers compared two versions of OLMo-1b: one pre-trained on 2.3 trillion tokens and another on 3 trillion tokens.

item.title: The Download: peering inside an LLM, and the rise of Signal
item.description: This is today’s edition of The Download, our weekday newsletter that provides a daily dose of what’s going on in the world of technology. Anthropic ca...

item.title: 3 women share advice for navigating the robotics industry
item.description: This Women's History Month, we spoke with 3 women with a variety of industry experiences about what they've learned from working in robotics. The post...

item.title: New approach to agent reliability, AgentSpec, forces agents to follow rules
item.description: Researchers from Singapore Management University developed a new domain-specific language for agents to remain reliable.

item.title: The TAO of data: How Databricks is optimizing AI LLM fine-tuning without data labels
item.description: New approach flips the script on enterprise AI adoption by using input data you already have for fine-tuning instead of needing labelled data.

item.title: Hands on with Gemini 2.5 Pro: why it might be the most useful reasoning model yet
item.description: Gemini 2.5 Pro stands out with its massive context window, impressive multimodal reasoning and detailed reasoning chain.

item.description: This week, MIT Technology Review published a piece on bodyoids—living bodies that cannot think or feel pain. In the piece, a trio of scientists argue ...

item.title: The first trial of generative AI therapy shows it might help with depression
item.description: The first clinical trial of a therapy bot that uses generative AI suggests it was as effective as human therapy for participants with depression, anxi...

item.title: Zoox issues voluntary software recall for 258 vehicles
item.description: The recalled software is no longer in use, and no Zoox vehicles on the road operate with this software today. The post Zoox issues voluntary software ...
